channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @YehudisFletcher @UnitedSynagogue @BoardofDeputies The @TimesofIsrael story on this paper said they got one back in 2014.
item.source:markdown: @YehudisFletcher @UnitedSynagogue @BoardofDeputies The @TimesofIsrael story on this paper said they got one back in 2014.

item.description: @Shmarya Should, shmoud. Tachls: Can we monetize his tzuris somehow? Maybe set up some pay-to-pray tehillim WhatsApp groups on his behalf?
item.source:markdown: @Shmarya Should, shmoud. Tachls: Can we monetize his tzuris somehow? Maybe set up some pay-to-pray tehillim WhatsApp groups on his behalf?

item.description: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai Really, a crazy good batch of stories, obscured first by his Ender success and then his wingnut politics. “Fat Farm” meets Larry Niven’s criterion of being able to tell over at a cocktail party — or in a tweet.
item.source:markdown: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai Really, a crazy good batch of stories, obscured first by his Ender success and then his wingnut politics. “Fat Farm” meets Larry Niven’s criterion of being able to tell over at a cocktail party — or in a tweet.

item.description: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai What was striking in his first stories, compared to those that surrounded them in the issues of Analog and the like where they appeared, was the physicality. The sense of bodies, sometimes tortured, generally absent in the stories of engineers.
item.source:markdown: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai What was striking in his first stories, compared to those that surrounded them in the issues of Analog and the like where they appeared, was the physicality. The sense of bodies, sometimes tortured, generally absent in the stories of engineers.

item.description: @alon_levy Go on….

item.description: More bad news for Boy George. https://t.co/svywmCmaBM
item.source:markdown: More bad news for Boy George. https://t.co/svywmCmaBM

item.description: @VThePR @BeschlossDC No, because that was filed tonight. Perhaps he spoke with someone who told him what he could expect in the filing. Which, except for the photo, was largely predictable.
item.source:markdown: @VThePR @BeschlossDC No, because that was filed tonight. Perhaps he spoke with someone who told him what he could expect in the filing. Which, except for the photo, was largely predictable.

item.description: @trekonomics Families, man. The Book of Genesis tried to warn us, but did we listen?
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics Families, man. The Book of Genesis tried to warn us, but did we listen?

item.description: @MisfitTorah @nechamaaaa RHS inaugurating a kollel by feting an arms dealer with a shiur on tumat met as applied to kohanim flying over cemeteries played a large role in my post-YU radicalization.
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah @nechamaaaa RHS inaugurating a kollel by feting an arms dealer with a shiur on tumat met as applied to kohanim flying over cemeteries played a large role in my post-YU radicalization.

item.description: @EricJGreenberg1 The Tikvah Fund, now headed by Elliot Abrams, made a big to-do about hosting DeSantis at their conference a couple months back.
item.source:markdown: @EricJGreenberg1 The Tikvah Fund, now headed by Elliot Abrams, made a big to-do about hosting DeSantis at their conference a couple months back.

item.description: Hard to believe a Jewish organization led by a guy who lied to Congress to cover up complicity in a massacre would back this DeSantis but that’s the state of American Jewry today. https://t.co/BSgnuHMzcI
item.source:markdown: Hard to believe a Jewish organization led by a guy who lied to Congress to cover up complicity in a massacre would back this DeSantis but that’s the state of American Jewry today. https://t.co/BSgnuHMzcI

item.description: @pwthornton @froomkin Or the relevant managers don’t use desktops any more.

item.description: @trekonomics Probably safer to tweet about baseball and dogs.

item.description: @jamesdnicoll If you can target the Outback or some other desert, might be viable. I assume research into Apollo landings would indicate how much targeting can be done absent in-flight adjustments.
item.source:markdown: @jamesdnicoll If you can target the Outback or some other desert, might be viable. I assume research into Apollo landings would indicate how much targeting can be done absent in-flight adjustments.

item.description: @MisfitTorah Worth remembering that a Reagan-era law banned building new public housing. (I know the Biden Administration proposed repealing the law but I don’t know the outcome of that.)
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah Worth remembering that a Reagan-era law banned building new public housing. (I know the Biden Administration proposed repealing the law but I don’t know the outcome of that.)

item.description:
@trekonomics To quote a famous folk song from the 2040s:

@trekonomics I dreamed I saw Hank K last night / Alive as you or me / Said I to Hank you’re ten years gone / I never died said he
item.source:markdown:
@trekonomics To quote a famous folk song from the 2040s:
@trekonomics I dreamed I saw Hank K last night / Alive as you or me / Said I to Hank you’re ten years gone / I never died said he

item.description: @trekonomics Not part of his Deluxe Deal with the Devil!
